name: 陳秀慧
objective:
課程兩個主要目標為介紹各種高分子及有機光電材料
Introduction of various polymer and organic optical materials
schedule:
(W1) Introduction of course 
W2) Liquid Crystals (
W3) Liquid Crystals 
W4) Solar cell
W5) Solar Cell
W6) Nano materials 
W7) Compensatory Leave
W8) Mid-Exam (Report)
W9) Nano materials 
W10) Organic semiconductor 
W11) Organic semiconductor 
(W12) anti-corrosion coating
W13) anti-corrosion coating 
W14) Polymer conductor
W15) Polymer conductor 
W16) Optic-electronic materials 
W17) Optical-electronic materials 
W18) Final-Exam
consultation: 如果有任何疑問可以至分子科學系二樓或寄信到 email:hhchen@mailzntut.edu.tw
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG15：陸域生命（Life on Land）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
